reviewText: the founder of Yoga for Golfers, Katherine Roberts is the best teacher.  She explains every position so well that I couldn't go wrong.  Now my back no longer hurts after l8 holes, and I can visualize my putt dropping in the hole.  I love her videos.

Yoga For Golfers is simply the best golf Aid I have ever purchased.
I have experienced a significant improvement in my distance and accuracy because of this video.
I also feel better on and off the course.
It's had a greater impact on my game than I imagined
